title: 5.2 Master Challenge 1
question: Create two objects of the Integer class and use the intValue() method to convert it into the primitive type. After conversion, check whether the first value is divisible by the second value. Print the appropriate results.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
